name: REI Systems
overview:
REI Systems ensures enterprise IT investments can be leveraged with integration to SaaS applications and cloud computing. Using its 20 year history of developing web-enabled knowledge management, performance support solutions for work flow processes, REI will provide custom application development while the implementation team provides full integration from back office processes and legacy systems to Cloud Computing and Software as a Service applications.

Advisory Services design solutions for SaaS adoption and deployment based upon a clientâ€™s business and competitive environment. The solutions provide a transformation roadmap for business processes, applications and technology infrastructure that deliver high value to the client.

Custom Application Developers are certified on Force.com, developing custom applications for enterprise cloud computing requirements..

Project Implementation Services, CMMI Level 3 certified; use proven delivery methods ensuring highest quality, on-time delivery. The team works with a client throughout the entire project lifecycle with a pledge to meet client needs before a project is deemed complete.

Post-Implementation Support assures clients will receive full on-going benefits of the SaaS investment. Our personnel provide administration, maintenance, optimization, operations and training.
